name: TypemockSmartRunner
description: Run unit tests with Typemock SmartRunner
author: Typemock

inputs.name: testAssembly
inputs.label: Test Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test binaries to run tests on.  Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**\*test*.dll;-:**\obj\**` for all dlls with test in name while excluding files in any sub-directory named obj.

inputs.name: testFiltercriteria
inputs.label: Test Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional criteria to filter tests from Test assemblies. For example: `MyTestMethod, MyTestClass, AnotherTestClass.TestMethod`

inputs.name: testRunTitle
inputs.label: Test Run Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the Test Run.

inputs.name: testOutputFormat
inputs.label: Results Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies a format for Tests Results.

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Platform against which the tests should be reported. If you have defined a variable for platform in your build task, use that here.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configuration against which the tests should be reported. If you have defined a variable for configuration in your build task, use that here.

inputs.name: coverageAssembly
inputs.label: Coverage Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Assembly that will be checked by Coverage

inputs.name: coverageReportType
inputs.label: Code Coverage Report Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Code Coverage Report available in next formats.

inputs.name: licenseName
inputs.label: Company
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the license provided by Typemock (will run as Basic by default)

inputs.name: licenseKey
inputs.label: Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: License key provided by Typemock (will run as Basic by default)
